lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Due to the extraordinary situation surrounding AIDS, a fatal disease reaching what some health officials say is epidemic proportions, Windom said the FDA has moved in near record time--four months--to approve the drug.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Today's approval marks an important step but by no means a final victory against our ongoing war against AIDS," said Dr Robert E.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Public Health Agency said advanced ARC patients have symptoms that include weight loss, persistent fever and diarrhea, and less severe infections such as oral thrush and herpes infections.
